preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 16 g of cobalt powder. 
 2. Measure 2 g of magnesium powder. 
 3. Accurately weigh 12 g of phosphorus powder. 
 4. Weigh 6 g of terbium oxide. 
 5. Combine all powders in a clean, dry mixing container. 
 6. Stir the mixture thoroughly for at least 10 minutes to ensure homogeneity.
